content: cast on 35 stitches and then twisted the strip of knitting 180° before binding off using 3-needle bind-off see next page for positioning photos 12 x 36 30 x 90 cm it gives nice drape and a chunky feel without the bulk of a double-loop la drogerie baby douceur on 9mm © ashcroft-hempsall 2015 - for personal non-commercial use only speed 3 positioning for joining by grafting sewing or 3-needle bind-off note - the cowl shown in the photo has alternating bands of moss stitch and stockinette joining without a twist to join with a twist - turn one end of the strip 180° before joining with your chosen method checking the size - it s a good idea to try on the strip to check the length and also to check if you like it with a twist you can baste the two ends together with running stitches and yarn or i usually just use a smallish circular and pull the cable through as if it were thread © ashcroft-hempsall 2015 - for personal non-commercial use only
